main event: A witness observed a balloon-like object with haze around it in Beavercreek, Ohio on June 22, 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10-15 minutes; it was metallic and appeared smaller than a real balloon; the object was climbing out of sight and moving with the wind; the witness used 8x binoculars to observe the object; the conclusion suggested it was probably a balloon or a natural phenomenon.
witness description: The witness was relaxing in their yard when they noticed the object floating past.
